message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value. I'm extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $100. This is an exclusive offer tailored for potential buyers like yourself who appreciate quality and excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits of our product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice!  While I appreciate the special introductory price, I'm looking to get the best value possible.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $80? I'm confident this would be a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and am willing to negotiate further. Considering the value of our product and aiming for a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a price of $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $95 is still a bit higher than what I'm looking for. I'm happy to split the difference and offer $87.50. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows us both to walk away satisfied.
